reviewText: Slow moving through the first 3/4 of the film.  Several times I almost shut themovie off.The last part is well done, as the father and 2 daughters get close.Acting was good.
Title: A Fathers Choice

reviewText: excellent movie for the family. this is a movie you can watch over and over. worth buying
Title: A Fathers Choice

reviewText: Great story line about a lost parnet and how the other parent pick up the pieces and changes his lif for the better.
Title: A Fathers Choice

reviewText: Order this for a friend that love movies by Mary McDonnell.  Great movie.  I was glad to be able to find it.
Title: A Fathers Choice

reviewText: This is a must see movie for everyone.  It's the story of a father fighting to raise his two girls and keep them grounded. One of the best movies I've seen in a long time.
Title: A Fathers Choice

reviewText: I just purchased this DVD but have watched it several time.  Peter Strauss played the abscent father of two girls the youngest having seen the murder of her Mother.They have to give up a rich life style to live on a ranch where their father is just a Rodeo cowboy.  With the help of Mary McDonnel, a case worker from child services, he fights a wealthy Aunt and the ones who are investigating  their Mom's death to keep his girls but must first win the girls. It is a must see. Good clean movie for the family.
Title: A Fathers Choice

reviewText: Been looking for this movie for a while.  I'm so glad I can find these "hard to find" movies on Amazon.  The whole family saw this a couple times before I decided to look for it.  I should say it has to touch some place in the heart when two 20-something men/boys actually tell Mom to find it.  It's really nice that there are still movies out there with no gunfire, excessive swearing and show some family togetherness.  I liked how emotional distance is bridged as the two girls start to see their father through kinder eyes than through those of the bitter aunt and her family.  Sure, some of both girls acting is immature, but the meanings and feelings do translate.  I also love just about any movie that Mary McDonnell is in.  Give this movie a hearty hurrah!
Title: A Fathers Choice

reviewText: This is based on a true story and is definitely worth watching.  I have watched it many, many times and never get tired of it.
Title: A Fathers Choice
